verse.lines: {lang-eng}With numberless blessings each moment He crowns And, filled with His fullness divine, I sing in my rapture, “Oh, glory to God, For such a Redeemer as mine! ”{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}When clothed in His brightness, transported I rise To meet Him in clouds of the sky, His perfect salvation, His wonderful love, I’ll shout with the millions on high!{/lang-eng}
